data.text: Ma wò nunanawo ɖe akpa adre alo akpa enyi me
Ne tsi sɔ gbɔ ɖe lilikpowo me la, tsi dzana.
Ame si léa ŋku ɖe ya ƒe ƒoƒo ŋu la,
Mawu ƒe mɔwo le manyamanya me na mí
Nɔ wò nukuwo ƒaƒã dzi ko,
Enye nu nyui wɔnuku aɖe be ame nanɔ agbe!
Ele be ame si tsi, xɔ ƒe geɖe la,
Ɖekakpui, kpɔ dzidzɔ le wò ɖekakpuime,
eya ta ɖe nuxaxa ɖa le wò dzime,
